description: NISâ€“4 data were collected to provide updated estimates of the incidence of child abuse and neglect in the United States and measure changes in incidence from the earlier studies. The NIS follows a nationally representative sample design, so the estimates reflect the numbers of abused and neglected children in the United States who receive CPS investigation or come to the attention of community professionals.
title: Fourth National Incidende Study of Child Abuse and Neglect  (NIS-4)
